  \subsection{Functions}

    \label{FlowSampTest:FlowSampRyu:controller:flow_samp:hash_flow}
    \index{FlowSampTest \textit{(package)}!FlowSampTest.FlowSampRyu \textit{(package)}!FlowSampTest.FlowSampRyu.controller \textit{(package)}!FlowSampTest.FlowSampRyu.controller.flow\_samp \textit{(module)}!FlowSampTest.FlowSampRyu.controller.flow\_samp.hash\_flow \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{hash\_flow}(\textit{flow\_string})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Creates an MD5 hash for a particular flow string. Return only first 4 
    characters of the hash

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \index{FlowSampTest \textit{(package)}!FlowSampTest.FlowSampRyu \textit{(package)}!FlowSampTest.FlowSampRyu.controller \textit{(package)}!FlowSampTest.FlowSampRyu.controller.flow\_samp \textit{(module)}!FlowSampTest.FlowSampRyu.controller.flow\_samp.FlowSamp \textit{(class)}|(}
\subsection{Class FlowSamp}

    \label{FlowSampTest:FlowSampRyu:controller:flow_samp:FlowSamp}
\begin{tabular}{cccccc}
% Line for ryu.base.app\_manager.RyuApp, linespec=[False]
\multicolumn{2}{r}{\settowidth{\BCL}{ryu.base.app\_manager.RyuApp}\multirow{2}{\BCL}{ryu.base.app\_manager.RyuApp}}
&&
  \\\cline{3-3}
  &&\multicolumn{1}{c|}{}
&&
  \\
&&\multicolumn{2}{l}{\textbf{FlowSampTest.FlowSampRyu.controller.flow\_samp.FlowSamp}}
\end{tabular}

The Default Class For the Ryu Flow Samp Application Extends the simple 
learning switch provided in the Ryu Documentation 
https://github.com/osrg/ryu/blob/master/ryu/app/simple\_switch.py Contains 
own extension for the Adaptaion in packet\_in

    \label{FlowSampTest:FlowSampRyu:controller:flow_samp:FlowSamp:add_flow}
    \index{FlowSampTest \textit{(package)}!FlowSampTest.FlowSampRyu \textit{(package)}!FlowSampTest.FlowSampRyu.controller \textit{(package)}!FlowSampTest.FlowSampRyu.controller.flow\_samp \textit{(module)}!FlowSampTest.FlowSampRyu.controller.flow\_samp.FlowSamp \textit{(class)}!FlowSampTest.FlowSampRyu.controller.flow\_samp.FlowSamp.add\_flow \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{add\_flow}(\textit{self}, \textit{datapath}, \textit{priority}, \textit{match}, \textit{actions})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Add a particular flow @param datapath = router/switch @param priority =
    priority of the flow @param match = the rule differentiating the flow 
    from the rest @action = usually decision if to be sent to monitor as 
    well or not

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{FlowSampTest:FlowSampRyu:controller:flow_samp:FlowSamp:build_flow_string}

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}

    monitor load.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}
